text: kani, ayana varini kapadina ventane, varu bhumilo an'yayanga daurjan'yam ceyasagutaru. O manavulara! Niscayanga, mi daurjan'yalu mike hani kaligistayi. Ihaloka jivitam tatkalika anandame. Civaraku miku ma vaipunake marali ravalasi unnadi, appudu memu, miru cestu undina karmalanni miku teliyajestamu
